title: 398. The Truth About the Vaping Crisis
description: A recent outbreak of illness and death has gotten everyone’s attention — including late-to-the-game regulators. But would a ban on e-cigarettes do more harm than good? We smoke out the facts.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: A recent outbreak of illness and death has gotten everyone’s attention — including late-to-the-game regulators. But would a ban on e-cigarettes do more harm than good? We smoke out the facts.
